name: Finnish Energy - Energiateollisuus ry
goal:
• improve the welfare of citizens and the competitiveness of businesses by developing energy markets and securing energy supply in consideration with environmental and societal values
• promote use of district heating and electricity as a solution to environmental problems and to meet the demands of higher energy efficiency
• enhance the image, competitiveness and operational preconditions of energy businesses contributing in Finland
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Energy Union
Long-term climate strategy 2050
Emissions trading system
Review of the Energy efficiency directive
Review of the RES directive
Electromobility
Heating and cooling strategy
Bioenergy policy
Internal electricity market
LULUCF
National energy and climate plans
